Question: Daylight saving time (DST) is often erroneously attributed to a 1784 satire that this person published anonymously.
Hints: This person's actual grave, however, as he specified in his final will, simply reads "Benjamin and Deborah ****".
Beginning at age 16, Temple **** served as secretary to his grandfather during his mission to Paris during the Revolutionary War.
This person's electrical experiments led to his invention of the lightning rod.
